title: Coastal Barrier Resources Reauthorization Act of 2000
content: Allows the Secretary to add a parcel of real property to the System if the parcel's owner so requests and the parcel is an undeveloped coastal barrier. Authorizes appropriations. Mandates a System digital mapping pilot project and report to specified congressional committees on the feasibility and cost of creating digital versions of System maps. Authorizes appropriations. Requires a report to specified congressional committees containing an economic assessment of the System.
